shocked?\""},{"lineNumber":109477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":109478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の母があれほど一時期耽溺していた性行為。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The it?\""},{"lineNumber":109499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅむ、カラーにも色々あるんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, there really are all kinds of Colors.\""},{"lineNumber":109500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でもお母様、セックスは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But mother said that sex is"},{"lineNumber":109501,"originalJapaneseLine":"　汚らわしい野蛮な行為だから禁止って……」","translatedEnglishLine":" a filthy, barbaric act and therefore forbidden...\""},{"lineNumber":109502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かにそう言った」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She did say that, certainly.\""},{"lineNumber":109503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――が、私がそう思ってる、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—But she never said that I thought so,"},{"lineNumber":109504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんて一言も言ってない」","translatedEnglishLine":" not even once.\""},{"lineNumber":109505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれはただの方便」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was just a pretext.\""},{"lineNumber":109506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私だけセックス出来ないの悔しいし」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's frustrating that I'm the only one who can't have sex.\""},{"lineNumber":109507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, eeh...\""},{"lineNumber":109508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……九割冗談」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's 90% a joke.\""},{"lineNumber":109509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当時は、性行為を行うと情が湧いて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Back then, if a Color engaged in sexual intercourse, they'd develop feelings,"},{"lineNumber":109510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　男と駆け落ちするカラーがよくいた」","translatedEnglishLine":" and many Colors eloped with men.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふっとビビッドが顔を上げると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Vivid suddenly raised his face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青年は心から申し訳なさそうな表情をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young man had an expression of sincere apology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「他のカラーの方はともかく、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Queen is just too small..."
this is a problem even before that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女王には入らない、かと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t think it would fit the Queen..."
it would be difficult for the Queen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビビッドは心持ち、ぼう然としていた。
もしかして、ショック受けてます？」
「私の母があれほど一時期耽溺していた性行為。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The sexual acts my mother once indulged in so deeply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫌悪する感情と共に興味はあった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had interest along with feelings of disgust."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、正直少し楽しみだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, to be honest, I was somewhat looking forward to it."
Want to play cat's cradle or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうことがあった」
「ま、それはそれで終わった話だが――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that story ended as it was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女王である私が跡継ぎを産めないのは大問題」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a big problem that I, the Queen, cannot bear an heir."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラーの胎児は人間のそれと比べてかなり小さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The fetuses of Colors are considerably smaller compared to humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 性行為は出来ずとも、出産だけは出来る筈」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if intercourse isn't possible, childbirth alone should be possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、体内に精液だけを入れる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, a method was devised to insert only semen into the body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の妊娠方法が編み出された」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the current method of conception was developed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラーが人間と性行為をしないのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The reason Colors don’t have sex with humans is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そういういきさつだったのですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is—that sort of background to it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅむ、カラーにも色々あるんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, there really are all kinds of Colors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汚らわしい野蛮な行為だから禁止って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a filthy, barbaric act and therefore forbidden..."
"—But she never said that I thought so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんて一言も言ってない」
「私だけセックス出来ないの悔しいし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's frustrating that I'm the only one who can't have sex."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当時は、性行為を行うと情が湧いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Back then, if a Color engaged in sexual intercourse, they'd develop feelings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男と駆け落ちするカラーがよくいた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and many Colors eloped with men."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
